website_summaries.verdict: This full cover set offers a single-step solution to preserve your vehicle’s interior.
pros: Includes 2 high-back bucket seat covers, 1 bench cover, and 2 headrest covers for total protection
Products are made from mesh polyester fabric that is breathable, soft, and machine washable
3-millimeter foam backing improves ergonomics of your existing seats
cons: Users have reported difficult installation and weak stitching
Not compatible with split rear seats

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price point!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my 2003 Dodge Dakota SLT Quad Cab. Install for the front seats was easy, rear seats took a little more effort. Once I figured out what all the little straps we're for it was a breeze. Good quality material, softer than I expected and looks really good with the color options available. Definitely upgraded the interior over the cloth seats. High recommend! Also after a week or so of use the seat covers have better formed over the seat making the look even better. 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But Don't Overly Stretch
customer_reviews.text: Fits very nicely on Jeep Patriot or Compass Front seats, or possibly small SUV's with similar seat types. Not too snug, and can easily be strapped underneath or on sides (if necessary). Fabric is somewhat thin, so you may want to spray on some ScotchGuard after installation. Just don't expect to stretch on large SUV or Truck seats....you may tear the stitching or straps if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Ensoniqman

customer_reviews.title: Look sharp but sweaty
customer_reviews.text: They description these as having some ‘cool’ special fabric but it’s just plain old polyester that is more sweaty than leather! If it’s cold they at least look sharp. They ties in front don’t really line up for a brand new car or at least didn’t in my Ford Escape but would have in my older Lexcus car. I could have made it work but they would have covered the seat adjusters. They do show that you can cut the fabric for these obstacles. They are BIG so if you have little seats in a very small car these will be swimming all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: JeanDucksfan

customer_reviews.title: I’m Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews I finally decided to purchase and I am satisfied. I have a 2009 Chevy Cobalt and they fit well I just wish the front seat covers fit as well as the back seat covers. Installing the back seat covers was a little confusing at first by I finally got it. I gave 4 stars because of how big the front seat covers were. I would definitely recommend especially because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for 2012 Toyota Camry.
customer_reviews.text: PROS It fits the front seats perfectly, with a little tug here and there (including the head rests). It does look pretty good. Good material for the price. Backseat covers for sitting fits (with a little struggle). CONS Backseat covers does not have holes for your seat belt buckle. Backseat covers for your backs does not fit at all (including head rests). - I will give it a try again this weekend (03/10/19); if I don't give an updated review after this weekend, it's because it definitely didn't work out. Will I return the whole thing back to vendor? I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Trinh Diep

customer_reviews.title: WAS PURCHASED USED "LIKE NEW" PACKAGING WILL BE DAMAGED....AND WITH SOMEONES ANIMAL HAIR/FUR!!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is on AMAZON. I've purchased items that were sold/listed as "USED" in "LIKE NEW" condition for a little reduced cost. And majority of the time, I choose the "packaging will be damaged" item, assuming nothing will be wrong with the item itself, just the packaging. Most of the time, it pays off, Not this time, dogs hair was all embedded in the seat covers. Amazon should have inspected this item, deemed it unsanitary and destroyed it and not try to squeak out a profit. Definitely NOT IN USED LIKE NEW CONDITION! Going to have to return it for sure
customer_reviews.author: jmpnflea

customer_reviews.title: The smell was just awful
customer_reviews.text: So the odor was terrible when I took it out of the box and I hung them for two days and I even tried febreeze on it... I decided to send them back . I have asthma and couldn't take the smell and apparently the company didn't care that they smelled.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Discomfort...
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved the color and design! However, the back seat covers did not fit my car so it was a waste for me and I never used them ! Second, the two first seats always moved and never stood on right I was always fixing them when I got off the car and they fit right so they weren’t too big or too small they just moved too much and had a lot of discomfort! Now, my seats are back to not being covered because it was a bit annoying having to keep moving the covers. FYI I have a Toyota Corolla XSE
customer_reviews.author: Falicia

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done well!
customer_reviews.text: All in all, I'm very satisfied with these seat covers. They've stood up perfectly for the past nine months, and have protected my seats, not only from everyday wear, tear and dirt, but also the grease and grime from both working in a warehouse and having more than a few fast food dinners that ended up spilling out. The covers do balloon out a bit at the meeting of the backrest and the seat cushion, but that's mainly because I have such deep bucket seats and these don't have ties that maneuver through that crevice. Far from a deal breaker for me and it does not detract from the look.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old car. Toyota Tercel 1998. It said it was a good fit for my car. . . . It fits fine but it's a little baggy but nothing to be annoyed buy.. o tried tightening it from the bottom and sides but my seats are still smaller than it... But again, nothing Major. It still fits fine . Material is good it's been months and it's still in great condition and
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: This should be your first pick if you're not picky about the style of your seat covers and really just want something to keep the seats in good shape. They don't look particularly great and also are not very snug. But they are reasonably priced in a world of overpriced seat covers. Highly recommend for the average vehicle owner.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Rindfuss

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice for the price, my husband put them on and said they where easy to slip on & fit darn near perfectly too.. material is kind of thin but not that thin if, you put them on carefully you should not have a problem. We like em.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: What do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know of a car seat cover that gets 5 stars anywhere, if there is, I’d like to know. All seat covers are crap by nature, but hey, what do you expect? When they show up, they smell pretty bad so put them through the wash. I got a scar on my hand from installing these things. You have to shove your hand into tight places with sharp metal exposed. Maybe wear gloves next time. The drivers seat cover is getting a hole in it from just rubbing in the crotch region. My wife says they are comfy. They do a job, even if that’s not a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Improved Appearance for Classic Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Our 1992 Chevy Astro just keeps on going and going and going. Although the vehicle seems like it will last forever, the upholstery, however, does not. Seat covers were needed! An Amazon search revealed these and we bought 'em. They weren't that hard to install, it took about twenty minutes total for the two seats. My wife and I were extremely pleased with this product. The price was great, and the seats (front & passenger) look new. The color is very good and matches the maroon interior of our van. Many thanks to all parties involved with enabling us to get these seat covers!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe the quality for how cheap they are
customer_reviews.text: I had very low expectations for these seat covers. I just got tired of seeing a stain on one of my car seats and bought these because they were super cheap compared to other brands. Well, was I surprised! They were relatively easy to install and I haven't need to adjust the fit since. They also look great. Even if they only last for one year they are worth it. That being said though, I think they'll hold up for quite a while. I would repurchase them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer727

customer_reviews.title: got the looks, but....
customer_reviews.text: They look good don't get me wrong, but as i was helping put them over the bucket seats i could see the stitching already coming apart on a few of the seams.. not one, a FEW! I don't have any hope these will hold up.. they were a christmas gift for someone else, so, too late to return but should have bought different ones..
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: 2012 Chevy Cruze
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a few weeks ago for my 2012 Chevy Cruze. My job entails me getting dirty, so wanted something to cover my seats and spare them for the future without breaking the bank. These seat covers are perfect for something like that. They are mesh and slip over the entire seat and strap underneath so they don’t slide around. The quality is good for the price, but could be a little softer. I would purchase them again for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa gagnon

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: When I say they’re NOTHING like what they’re pedaling or what they show in the instructional vid, that’s what I mean. It was a waste of money, will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I admit that, for the price, I was not expecting much of these seat covers. I have been pleasantly surprised. I took the time to connect them properly under the seat and it wasn't particularly easy (Scion xB). But they've been in almost 4 months now and have not slipped or bunched up at all. I know they won't last forever but I hope they're still around when the time comes to replace them. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel about this product. Not the best not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time installing, especially the back seat covers. They still dont fit right even after looking up videos for install. I got frustrated and gave up. My front seat covers dont fir correctly and look odd. The covers fit over the headrest rather than velcro around. Not super satisfied but they seem to do the trip of protecting the interior. Just sloppy looking in this moment due to me having a hard time installing. I have a hyundai tucson.
customer_reviews.author: britnib

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, stay in place well and the blue (mesh like) material is cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 2004 Hyundai Elantra (my old car), that runs great but looks ugly. Been saving the Hyundai for my granddaughters get their licences (one down, one to go). I promised to help them "pretty up" the car, these seat covers went a long way in doing that. They stay in place well, don't stick to skin/clothes (even in July heat in Utah) and look great. Absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again, but just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is alright, the rear bench is the hardest thing to put together since the time i built my first pc. The rear bench also doesnt have holes for seatbelts or a great way to fasten it down. But it looks good and feels good after 1.5 hours of work. All in all, theyre good but wouldnt buy any type of seat covers again. *side note* couldnt get a good picture of the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Devin K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my Nissan Sentra!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I needed to cover my seats because I'm a part time Uber driver. If you don't have great air conditioning in your car, these covers will be making you sweat if you're driving alot. They look nice and seem to be durable. I like they way they make my car's interior look. It looks like I had these custom made. They were a hassle to put on so my husband helped but overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NYCPhotoGurl

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I wished it came with better instructions. I bought this for my 2017 Corolla. It wasn't the easiest to put on and so far I've only figured out the two front seats lol I'm not even sure where to put these straps through for the back seat. I'll be YouTubing for help. These do look nice though, not cheap looking and the beige matches my interior almost perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love the purple one! Great for leather interior.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my car seat covers. So glad I found them . Especially this time of year. I have leather seats so I needed something to protect me from getting leg and back burns in this hot summer. Love the purple. If I could just find the back seat cover to match that would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this price for the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 1994 Chevy K1500 extended cab. Great fit on first and second row. Easy to install, took maybe 15 minutes total to install all three pieces. Very inexpensive protection for my seats (even if they only last a year it would be worth it, I'll update if they tear or rip in the next year)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Did not last long. Home in about a week it broke. Also doesn’t fit my 2001 Ford Mustang. They were too big and keep sliding off even though I tightened the best they could Also doesn’t fit my 2001 Ford Mustang
customer_reviews.author: I love Amazons Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fine seat cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these seat covers to slide over the seat on my utility vehicle. The OEM seat gets very hot when parked up in the sun and the cover makes a world of difference. Obviously the fit is loose as the UTV seat is undersized compared to a car seat, but the straps keep it secure so all is well. The seat covers are of the quality that you would expect for the price, but for my purposes this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Nicely tailored fit for Jeep XJ
customer_reviews.text: These covers fit the seats in my 1995 Cherokee very nicely. They are easy to install and aren’t prone to slipping off. One install tip: pay attention to your seat tracks. It is easy to just wrap the straps over the tracks in such a way that they would get hung up when adjusting the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update, it was my mistake. Get the product.
customer_reviews.text: After going over the product description I realize that it does come with backseat headrest covers. Apparently I put them on the front seat. Oh, my my. Lol. So basically the front doesn't have headrest covers. I thought I saw on the installation video, headrest being placed on the front seat but I might be mistaken. So it was all my mistake. Regardless it's still a product I'm happy with and will definitely recommend. Dont make my mistake. So all the difficult stemmed from my misunderstanding so 5 stars it is. Buy it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: These are a no buy for me.
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT like this product very much. When I put in the car I have it was said to fit my 14 Toyota Corolla, and that's flat out false. The front seat covers loosely fit to the seat. The rear seat covers DO NOT fit at all. They are made for a solid back seat so I had to jimmy-rig them on to my back seat. I just needed them to cover up my stained seats so they serve that purpose, but I'm throughly unimpressed with these seat covers.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Berryhill

customer_reviews.title: Nice seatcovers but...
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice seat covets for the price. Affordable, durable and stylish as it gives your car a whole new face lift! Only downfall is the installation as the two fromt seat covets are no problem to install but the back seat was a beast to install! Very difficult but there is a video you can watch before installing. But overall very pleased with my purchase..m
customer_reviews.author: DivaB!💃

customer_reviews.title: installation straps
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice & comfortable but on my Jeep it takes some work to get the straps together because of space. Thats why the 4 stars. I would recommend his item. I would also give 5 Stars because of the price & you get 2 sets. 1 set for standard high back buckets & 1 set for buckets with removable head rests
customer_reviews.author: lokene

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have an eclipse and wanted to protect the leather. This item is good if your seats are a foot off the ground or you plan on taking out seats to install them. To make it fit my seats right would have to put a pillow in seat to make up the gap between seat and cover. Lots of slack
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are not compatible with an 04 Ford Expedition. The front seats did fit and were easy to install, however, the material is very scratchy and irritating on my legs. The back seats didn't fit. They weren't wide enough to fit all the way across the seat. Maybe in a smaller suv, like a trail blazer or escape? Shipping was very fast and the return was super easy. We didn't have to pay for return shipping either, which was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: R Heath

customer_reviews.title: Accurate picture and description of the product. Don’t trick the customers with fake images.
customer_reviews.text: The picture and the description was about A package that includes all the covers for all the car seats. Unfortunately I only received two items (driver and passanger seat cover) not three, like the picture on the description don’t know if they forgot to put the back seat cover in the package or if someone took it off the bag because the package was already open when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: shirley santos

customer_reviews.title: Soft & sturdy seat covers
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son was thrilled to help me install these seat covers. It took us longer than it should have because I didn't bother to read the directions (my fault-lol). Once we got it put on the seats, they look great. No more worry about dirtying/cleaning up the light colored seats to my new car. Excellent quality, excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Jillyn31

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to protect my seats against dog hair and dog disasters for a week long road trip worth 53 hours of drive time with .y 50 and 70 pound furbabies. It did the job! I love these seat covers . Going to buy another set for my other vehicle
customer_reviews.author: cecilia gee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I expected some cheap paper thin covers but I was impressed when I felt the thick high quality material. The only thing I didn't like was how the front seat covers fit. The backrest doesnt fit tight to the actual seat so they are baggy looking. I have detachable headrests so I would imagine that they would fit better with non detachable headrests. Other than that very happy with these
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: You need a professional
customer_reviews.text: Be fully aware that you will have to completely remove back seat to install this product. When I say "remove" I mean REMOVE like completely GUT your backseat like a car mechanic. I must have missed this feature when reading the reviews or else I would've never bought this. Not sure if all seat covers work like this but I'm pissed they took my money.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: Juat installed these in my 2006 Nissan Frontier today. The fit is really good for universal. We will see how they hold up long term. They were of much better quality than i expected. They are also really soft and comfortable. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bckrupps37

customer_reviews.title: Bleh, they are ok
customer_reviews.text: These are an ok cheap option. Not the best look to be honest. I installed it on a 2009 Chevy Malibu. The wet spots are from a little spilt water. I’ll use them for a few months and buy some more expensive ones. If you’re buying on a budget or for your kid I recommend. If looking for something that looks nice and original, I would pass.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Todd Evans

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: My siblings (and other guest) are always causing a mess in my car, so I ordered these seat covers to make it easier to clean up. It look a good minute to figure out to put them on (found out I couldn't really use a piece or two), but the covers look great in my car. They are easy to clean and they are really comfortable. I wish that there was a hole for the seat belt in the middle backseat. But overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Qua'zanae Boldon

customer_reviews.title: They are a good value  but not on top of leather
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these in my 2009 f450 first set lasted 3 years for what you pay for them it is a good value my first set was all black I preferred those over these but that’s not manufacturers fault. I like them, my seats are a little rough makes them look good . If you have leather seats I would recommend something else ,?they slip I’ll over in my f350
customer_reviews.author: oaktrac

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy !
customer_reviews.text: I love these seat covers so much ! they look so good , they make my car look great ! they feel really comfortable & soft so i really do recommend these seat covers ! although it was a little confusing to put on at first but it’s okay !
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Fits our Jeep seats nicely, but do wish they were a bit tighter. But I have really messed with seeing if they tie better or if I did not see some ties. Admittedly I pretty much just threw these on the seats. Helps if you have a older vehicle like ours and the seats are really showing wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: THERESA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned. It wasn't until the package arrived that it stated not for use with seat airbags.
customer_reviews.author: thatsacoolphotodotcom

customer_reviews.title: Good for an average car seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good average car seat covers. They weren’t that easy to put on, but they’ve stayed in place well. They’re pretty dirty now so I’m about to wash them. I’ll see what condition they’re in after a wash. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tone Le Lone

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers are just what I needed for my Jeep, to replace the old ones. They were easy to install, and the videos to show how to install them were easy to find, which I checked out before I ever unpacked them. The fit well, and have a good clean look to them.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Protects my seats
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 honda civic with vinyl seats which stains with pretty much everything. The cover installation is pretty tricky but I believe the packaging came with a guide and a website with video. However, I don't think the backseats of my car were compatible with these covers. I gave the seat covers 5 stars because I accidentally spilled coffee on the seat covers and it did NOT seep through!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look on my car. Its a little pricey for the material, hopefully it lasts a few months. Its a little hard instaling it on your own specially for the back. It doesnt have headrest for the back seats or not sure if it doesnt come with it but its fine i had extra ones from my other car...instructions are pretty basic took me about an hour to do it myself. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great stop-gap for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this has been a fantastic Bandaid for the rip in my leather driver's seat. I couldn't be bothered to attach it super-properly so the cover slides around a bit (particularly when entering & exiting). Again, as opposed to $200 custom covers, this will do the trick for now. I'd definitely both buy this again & recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Looked really fancy at the start, but they started to deteriorate after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, these covers are a bang for the buck and will make your car look nicer for little money. However, take in consideration that they are cloth covers, so anything that can hook to them can messed them up. Also, mines are already ripping apart where the seatbelts are located, the good thing is that is not noticeable, but I'm pretty sure it's going to get worse over time. Washing them is easy and makes them look fresh, just don't leave them that long on the dryer, just enough until they are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Viso

customer_reviews.title: Such GREAT seat covers that my son bought these for his brand new car too!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! A pain with ALL seat covers...but these were the easiest I have ever used as far as that! They blend in well with my Nissan Altima with beige interior! My son loved them so much in my car that he bought the same ones for his brand spankin new car....so that says alot!! Great quality for a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Kelley Kelley

customer_reviews.title: If you fancy a challenge
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers are useful if you're able to remove the seats from the car completely, otherwise stay away. Where the straps need to go, in ordered to be properly secured, is pretty difficult with today's modern cars. Unless you have the hands of a small child there's no way you can fish these straps in between the brackens and under the seats
customer_reviews.author: Devylyst

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Instructions did not say how to route the straps, was a bit frustrating at first but eventually I figured it out. Not sure what to do with the metal clips but otherwise they work.
customer_reviews.author: ilya ilchenko

customer_reviews.title: Used for Prius C.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad. Fairly easy to install. The bench in the back seat couldn’t really be tied down because of the seat design. But we made it work. They look a little saggy but it’s okay. Better than dirty seats!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, make sure they will fit your car
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality material, but after using them for over a week, you will forget all about it. Works well as a cover, and the pattern works well for my interiors, but your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: S Morgan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The material is a lot cheaper than I expected. Granted for the price, I guess you couldn’t expect too much. The photos just made the quality look a lot nicer. It also said they would fit my seats, and they didn’t. They slide and leave bubbles between the seat and the cover. I’ll buy different ones eventually.
customer_reviews.author: shelabes

customer_reviews.title: FIT 1999 Jeep Cherokee SE 4.0 4-door.
customer_reviews.text: My original seats still look new and I want to keep them that way. This inexpensive set replaced an old set of seat covers. Securing the straps under the seats are a little tricky and the covers fit the front high-back bucket seats and two-piece back bench seat. I am the only person in the Jeep, so they should last years.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a stain
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the material left permanent stains on the upholstery it was supposed to protect
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R. Revkin

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the BUTT to install but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These covers are real sleek looking. My fiance had some other ones that didn't stay on the seat, kept sliding around. These definitely hold up, and look great in his car. Great product for the price. He has a Toyota corolla 2016, had to cut out the head set for the back seats FYI
customer_reviews.author: akphn5

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for little bucks
customer_reviews.text: The $11 price tag led me to push the order button. Looking for covers for old pickup that is rarely used but has survived 10 years driven by a heavy smoker. Several cleanings later, the seats were still grubby. The covers did the trick, fit well and updated the grungy truck to 'driveable and no longer embarrassed by' status. Probably one of the best buys I've picked up lately.
customer_reviews.author: KateAK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price, Good marterial fits, well on my WRX
customer_reviews.text: would of gave 5 stars if they were a tiny bit thicker but the price was really good so its fine and better securing straps. Also wouldn't hurt to be able to to get custom ones and pay extra down the road. Like saying WRX/STi on them would be amazin
customer_reviews.author: H7nter

customer_reviews.title: NOT bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: We were happy with these cover especially for the price. BUT we unfortunately wanted to return and the shipping was $6--- not worth it to return. So be sure you really need and want these before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 06 jeep Wrangler. They are an amost perfect fit! They look really nice! Better than spending gobs of money on ones that are actually made to fit jeeps. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: twiztidfreak1992

customer_reviews.title: Not for every car so be careful
customer_reviews.text: they didn't ask you to give me what I asked for so be very careful about that and I was tired of keep on resetting and returning stuff back so I just went ahead and dealt with it but I had to cut my own hole inside a seat and it messed up the the fabric and stuff so it didn't came out quite good like I wanted to but other than that be careful
customer_reviews.author: TheTRUTH

customer_reviews.title: Seat covers are great
customer_reviews.text: Little hard to get set up in car but worth it. I have a 2005 pt cruiser convertible and had to make a few adjustments. Overall results were great. The color blue looks just like the pictures. I’ve had no problems with ripping, they seem to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Got em for my kids car..made it look aor better ..god the dirty seats..looks new to him...not easy to install but you’ll figure it out stretch it how you like...remove the head rest first then punch holes to put back on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install on Nissan Altima with leather interior
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in November and today the clips that hold the seat cover down ripped off and the middle of the seat cover where the straps go through the seat is splitting. I would not recommend these as a long term seat cover but something to protect the leather until you find something better fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great p ice
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I purchased these covers because my car seats are badly ripped and these covers are cheap. With that being said, I have used them for a few months now and they seem very durable, they don't fit my seat perfectly, (04 Ford explorer) but they don't slide around, and they do the job. I would definitely purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: That blue haired girl

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: So many hooks and pieces you will be overwhelmed before you even start. It's like the worst jigsaw puzzle ever made. The people who managed to actually get this onto their seats should be working for NASA.
customer_reviews.author: laurence l.

customer_reviews.title: does not last long
customer_reviews.text: only lasted a few months. this is a quick fix for someone who needs something right away. but these seats are terrible. do not buy. spring for something a little better quality. they were also super annoying to put in and install.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: True to description seat covers
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cords to tie the covers down, but we got it figured out. These look good, and covered up the ugly stain on my seat. They fit perfectly over the seat, and weren't too bad to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 98 Tahoe.. Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my1998 Chevy Tahoe with removable headrests and they fit perfectly over the headrests. The material feels soft and cool. I just installed them so I don't know how durable they are yet. The price is on point.
customer_reviews.author: Helio DelSol

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to put on
customer_reviews.text: This were literally the biggest pain to put on After an hour I gave up still not on idk how not easy at all I don’t understand Such a headache
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: These dont stay on as well as other covers I have purchased in the past. Yes, I did install per the instructions. Otherwise they seem high quality and are comfortable. I have to readjust the front covers about twice a month so they arent wrinkled through normal everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Runningoutofspace

customer_reviews.title: Not for trucks/Takes longer than a minute
customer_reviews.text: Minute installation my ass, I’m sorry but this took about 40 minutes per seat and not including the bench. The seat covers were also way too long, and don’t include head rest covers for the front 2. They also do not look like the advertised product, however they do feel of decent quality. They also do not have holes in the seat covers for the head rest to go through so you must poke your own. If anyone owns a truck I would move on, these did not work very well for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit, didnt feel great.
customer_reviews.text: Because they are generic "universal" they don't properly fit and end up looking pretty terrible. They don't stay in place or feel great either. They do breath quite well though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A. Keller

customer_reviews.title: They look very nice in my car and the color is great
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice in my car and the color is great. I gave it a 3 because they slip and slide around even when clipped down. They probably aren't going to last long. Works well as a temporary cover in my opinion. I guess it's okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Best multifit covers on the market
customer_reviews.text: The fitment was extremely well for aftermarket multifit system, they fit tight on my 08 sierra 1500 with removable headrest. They are the same style and design of my factory so they look so close to factory
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Has straps that go under seat to tighten cover :-)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it had straps that would tighten up the bottom of the seat cover. It's definitely nice having a nice tight fit so the seat doesn't slide off as you're sliding into the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jaki M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Camaro Z28 1995. Color pattern is almost the same (I have the red flame interior). The fit is good, I still need to fix the bottom part but overall I am ver happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Cheap avoid
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a 2000 Honda Insight. The covers are thin and the back/upper portion is super loose without any way of adjusting (short of getting out thread and needle). Regret purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dev null

customer_reviews.title: So upset. It cost to return so make sure it will fit before buying it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2003 Chevy trailblazer. It said it would fit my car and it didn't! I tried to return and get a refund it would cost me half of what I spent! That super sucks and that's why I gave the rating I did. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: Robert Curd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a older Toyota that I use for work and the seats needed new covers. For the price I thought I couldn't go wrong even it they didn't fit. Boy was I surprised. They fit perfectly and they give my old car a new look.. They fit nice and tight and were easy to install. I highly recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat covers
customer_reviews.text: These are nice seat covers for your vehicle. Easy to install and the straps underneath make them cinch down and fit perfectly. I haven't washed them yet, but they seem very durable. The mesh is a little scratchy when you're wearing shorts
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Car seat covers both headrest and car seat, plenty of attached ropes to tie to your seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The material feels comfy and good quality. There are plenty of attached ropes to tie along your car seats. The only thing I would say that is kind of odd is that the entire car seat cover covers both the headrest and the car seat so it may look a little odd. Usually its a separate set.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Xiong

customer_reviews.title: A no-go for a 2019 Toyota Corolla
customer_reviews.text: A few reasons why I returned this car seat cover set: 1. Does not fit a 2019 Toyota Corolla 2. Installation was an attempted feat 3. Longevity is questionable It is inexpensive for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: DesertTopaz

customer_reviews.title: Auto Seat Cover, Set of 2
customer_reviews.text: They were a flipping pain in the bunghole to install!!!!! Even with the video they gave me. I really did not like them after I tried to install them. It took me a while, then I give up. I sold them on Craigslist.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchlovin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality seat covers
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks overall. It doesn’t fit like a custom seat cover would but I knew this when I ordered. My husband put them on for me and did have a bit of trouble doing it but it turned out nice.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Seat Covers
customer_reviews.text: Good but I wish the tightening strings would have been stronger. Overall it’s protecting my vehicle and avoiding spills. Good car seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Alba Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased!
customer_reviews.text: An awesome product for the price paid. Easy to install and looks great. Good quality material, soft and don't seem to pick up lint. They also are cool feeling which is great because nobody wants to sit on a hot seat. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy, but cheaply priced
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay product. It feels kind of cheap and flimsy, but it is very cheaply priced. I used it to cover a leather seat that had been completely split apart and beyond repair. This cover was perfectly fine for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: DesignGirl

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 front seats
customer_reviews.text: Says package includes back seats as well as front. Recieved only front seats. Turns out it's a mistake in the ad. Reported to Amazon weeks ago and they still haven't fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: carlyflower

customer_reviews.title: Stylish seat covers for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable and cool design for your car. I was a bit skeptical at first on how it will look on my Prius but it meshed well with the interior. It took a while to install all the seat covers but thanks for the installation videos on YouTube, I was able to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Good product same as described
customer_reviews.text: Good product same as described needs more seller like this kind pricing was awesome lower then other sites and shops
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and hard to install. They don’t stay on. I don’t even have the back part put on because I have no idea how to do it. It’s so confusing that I think I could reupholster my interior myself and it would be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice once they are on
customer_reviews.text: I know these are universal, but it was a little tough to get into a 2016 corolla. And the Bench seats are hard as well. I bought these for my brother, and he likes them. But we couldn't get the bench seat on which sucks. Other than that they are pretty nice!
customer_reviews.author: Bassmender

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Settle for less than what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Just like the price. Not universal. Misleading. And they’ll do the job. But nothing to write home about. I’d say expect a cheap product and you won’t be surprised
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Dawson

product_meta.title: FH Group FB102GRAY114 Gray 3D Air Mesh Auto Seat Cover (Full Set)
product_meta.description: Color:GrayUpdate the look of your vehicle's interior in just minutes. Whether you're after the sophisticated feel of PU leather seat covers, or the classic comfort of cloth seat covers, or even the lush experience of velour seat covers, we've got you (and your seats) covered. Protect your car seats from damage, cover up ripped and torn upholstery, or just treat your car to a facelift.
feature_bullets: Includes 2 High Back Covers1 1 Bench Cover and 2 Separate Headrest Covers
Our fabric bench covers are 52 inches in length.
Materials are Made from Durable & Comfortable Breathable 3D Air Mesh Fabric- Easy to Clean Machine washable, Air dry
Universal application fits almost all seats ( Cars, Trucks, Vans, & SUV )
This set is not compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,042 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
